about.heroDescription: A passion project by two Kabyle students dedicated to preserving our cultural heritage through a digital archive.
about.storyDescription: We are two students from Kabylie, united by a shared passion for our cultural heritage. Growing up surrounded by the rich traditions, music, and stories of our people, we realized how much of this legacy was at risk of being lost. That's why we created Tamazight Treasures ‚Äì a digital sanctuary where the essence of Kabyle culture can be preserved and shared with the world.
about.teamMember1Description: Massilia is a history enthusiast dedicated to documenting Kabyle traditions and stories.
about.teamMember2Description: Amine brings technical expertise to build a robust platform for cultural preservation.

rules.title: What to Share
rules.description: Send us Kabyle-related content‚Äîlike songs, family photos, or stories‚Äîthat you created or have permission to share.

rules.title: Your Rights
rules.description: Only submit content you own or have rights to. No copyrighted material unless you have approval.

review.title: Our Review Process
review.description: Every submission helps us grow, and we carefully review each one to maintain the quality and authenticity of our archive.

steps.description: You submit your content through our form below, providing details and the file.
Our team evaluates the submission for relevance, authenticity, and adherence to guidelines.
